ayah_translit: ha-meem
ayah_english: Ha Meem

ayah: وَٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayah_translit: wal-kitabi al-mubini
ayah_english: By the Book the clear

ayah: وَٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayah_translit: wal-kitabi al-mubini
ayah_english: By the Book the clear

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
ayah_translit: inna anzalnahu fi laylatin mubarakatin inna kunna mundhirina
ayah_english: Indeed We revealed it in a Night Blessed Indeed We [We] are (ever) warning

ayah: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: la ilaha illa huwa yuh'yi wayumitu rabbukum warabbu abaikumu al-awalina
ayah_english: (There is) no god except Him He gives life and causes death your Lord and (the) Lord (of) your fathers the former

ayah: أَهُمۡ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ قَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: ahum khayrun am qawmu tubba'in wa-alladhina min qablihim ahlaknahum innahum kanu muj'rimina
ayah_english: Are they better or (the) people (of) Tubba and those before them before them We destroyed them indeed, they were criminals

ayah: يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
ayah_translit: yad'una fiha bikulli fakihatin aminina
ayah_english: They will call therein for every kind (of) fruit secure

ayah: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
ayah_translit: la yadhuquna fiha al-mawta illa al-mawtata al-ula wawaqahum adhaba al-jahimi
ayah_english: Not they will taste therein the death except the death the first And He will protect them (from the) punishment (of) the Hellfire

ayah: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
ayah_translit: fadlan min rabbika dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu

ayah: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-innama yassarnahu bilisanika la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
ayah_english: Indeed We have made it easy in your tongue so that they may take heed
